name: Quarantime Shopper
description:
Scared to go shopping during a pandemic? Use this simulator to practice before doing it in real life!

Game Design:     Mark Wilson & Samantha Munro

Game Art:             Samantha Munro

Game Dev.:          Mark Wilson

Background music freely available from BenSound.com

Sound Effects royalty free from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Game source code available here: https://bitbucket.org/MarkW250/quarantime_3d/src/master/

History

This is a game my wife (Samantha Munro) and I worked on as our very first game jam entry. We were a bit ambitious and spent a lot of time in a short time span to get it to the point it is at the moment, but learnt a lot along the way :)

We don't particularly enjoy grocery shopping, and the current pandemic has made the prospect of doing our shopping even worse. This game is our light-hearted expression of our dislike for the grocery shopping chore.
